title: 玩家没有传送权限
author: 半夜咳嗽的狼
txt_content:
1.8.8的PaperSpigot端，Default默认玩家组，使用warp指令显示无传送权限，OP可以正常传送，请注意，op使用tpahere也无法传送玩家！是不是少给了什么权限
essentials.help
essentials.helpop
essentials.list
essentials.motd
essentials.rules
essentials.spawn
essentials.jail.allow.help
essentials.jail.allow.helpop
essentials.jail.allow.rules
essentials.warp
essentials.tpa
essentials.tpaccept
essentials.tpahere
essentials.tpdeny
essentials.afk
essentials.afk.auto
essentials.back
essentials.back.ondeath
essentials.jail.allow.mail
essentials.hat
essentials.mail
essentials.mail.send
essentials.pay

replies.author: huwei5201314789
replies.txt_content:
尝试让OP输入/manuadd OP名字 Owner
OP移进这个组后，再试试有没有这些权限，如果有了，那么就是你的玩家默认的权限组出问题了。
如果没有，建议你还是换个ESS的版本和GM的版本吧

replies.author: moshimowang18
replies.txt_content: 应该是默认组的权限配置有误

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
请问传送的地方是否在领地中？
/res set tp true
好歹给个没权限的信息啊
